com.here.mobility.sdk.demand

Class DemandClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.mobility.sdk.core.net.GrpcClient
      • com.here.mobility.sdk.demand.DemandClient

  • public abstract class DemandClient
extends GrpcClient
    The client class for accessing the Demand API, used for requesting, booking and managing rides.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  DemandClient.RideUpdateListener
      The listener interface to be implemented by the caller, to get notifications about Ride updates.

      • cancelRide

        @NonNull
public abstract ResponseFuture<java.lang.Void> cancelRide(@NonNull
                                                                   java.lang.String rideId,
                                                                   @NonNull
                                                                   java.lang.String reason)
        Cancels an active or future ride. This request has no return value. Check for the status of the ride to make sure the cancellation was processed successfully.
        Parameters:
        rideId - ID of ride to be cancelled
        reason - reason for the cancellation

      • registerToRideUpdates

        public void registerToRideUpdates(@NonNull
                                  DemandClient.RideUpdateListener listener)
        Register for ride updates. The listener is called on the looper of the thread calling this method.
        Parameters:
        listener - DemandClient.RideUpdateListener to be called on updates

      • registerToRideUpdates

        public void registerToRideUpdates(@NonNull
                                  DemandClient.RideUpdateListener listener,
                                  @NonNull
                                  android.os.Handler handler)
        Register for ride updates. After calling this method, the listener is called immediately for all rides updated in the past 3 hours, and then it's called for any new status update.
        Parameters:
        listener - DemandClient.RideUpdateListener to be called on updates
        handler - The handler on which to call the listener.

      • registerToRideUpdates

        public void registerToRideUpdates(@NonNull
                                  java.lang.String rideId,
                                  @NonNull
                                  DemandClient.RideUpdateListener listener)
        Register for ride updates of the ride with the given id. The listener is called on the looper of the thread calling this method.
        Parameters:
        rideId - ID of the ride in whose updates you're interested
        listener - DemandClient.RideUpdateListener to be called on updates

      • registerToRideUpdates

        public void registerToRideUpdates(@NonNull
                                  java.lang.String rideId,
                                  @NonNull
                                  DemandClient.RideUpdateListener listener,
                                  @NonNull
                                  android.os.Handler handler)
        Register to ride updates of the ride with the given id. The listener will be called on the looper of the thread calling this method.
        Parameters:
        rideId - The id of the ride in whose updates you're interested
        listener - DemandClient.RideUpdateListener to be called on updates
        handler - the handler on which to call the listener

      • unregisterFromRideUpdates

        public void unregisterFromRideUpdates(@NonNull
                                      DemandClient.RideUpdateListener listener)
        Unregister from ride updates.
        Parameters:
        listener - DemandClient.RideUpdateListener to unregister.
